page.title: 05GAME - KICK-THE-CAN
page.content: KICK-THE-CAN Kick-the-can is a game where everyone except one person hides. That person hides his eyes and counts to a number decided before he started counting. Then he looks around and tries to find the others.When anyone wants to try to run to base where he hid his eyes (called the can) they may do so. If he sees them running to the can, he can run, and they try to beat each other to the can. If the person who hid his eyes wins, he shouts, "Kick-the can" and the person's name.But if the person who hid beats the person who is on then he shouts,"Kick-the-can save myself".At the end the first person caught is on next, unless the last person saves all.To save all instead of saying"Kick-the-can save myself" you say "Kick-the-can save all" and the person who is on counts again.
